name: misshapen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having an unusual shape or the wrong shape: The drug caused some babies to be born with misshapen limbs. Astigmatism is a common eye disorder caused by a misshaped cornea. Synonym
deformed
More examplesFewer examplesWhen the cake arrives, it is misshapen and decorated with disgusting brown .Some people want permanent cosmetics to even out lopsided lips, or misshapen brows.Sickle cell disease is problematic because it causes blood cells to become misshaped and clot more easily.

Add to word list
Add to word list
having a shape that is not natural: His knee is badly misshapen from years of football and seven operations.
